verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> Aaron<WH175> and to<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> that they separate themselves<WH5144> from the holy things<WH4480> <WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and that they profane<WH2490> not<WH3808> <WH853> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> in those things which<WH834> they<WH1992> hallow<WH6942> unto me: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Say <WH559> unto<WH413> them, Whosoever<WH3605> <WH376> he be of all<WH4480> <WH3605> your seed<WH2233> among your generations,<WH1755> that<WH834> goeth<WH7126> unto<WH413> the holy things,<WH6944> which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> hallow<WH6942> unto the LORD,<WH3068> having his uncleanness<WH2932> upon<WH5921> him, that<WH1931> soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from my presence:<WH4480> <WH6440> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

What man soever<WH376> <WH376> of the seed<WH4480> <WH2233> of Aaron<WH175> is a leper,<WH6879> or<WH176> hath a running issue;<WH2100> he shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of the holy things,<WH6944> until<WH5704> <WH834> he be clean.<WH2891> And whoso toucheth<WH5060> any thing<WH3605> that is unclean<WH2931> by the dead,<WH5315> or<WH176> a man<WH376> whose<WH834> seed<WH7902> <WH2233> goeth<WH3318> from<WH4480> him;

Or <WH176> whosoever<WH376> <WH834> toucheth<WH5060> any<WH3605> creeping thing,<WH8318> whereby<WH834> he may be made unclean,<WH2930> or<WH176> a man<WH120> of whom<WH834> he may take uncleanness,<WH2930> whatsoever<WH3605> uncleanness<WH2932> he hath;

The soul<WH5315> which<WH834> hath touched<WH5060> any such shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> even,<WH6153> and shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of<WH4480> the holy things,<WH6944> unless<WH3588> <WH518> he wash<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> with water.<WH4325>
And when the sun<WH8121> is down,<WH935> he shall be clean,<WH2891> and shall afterward<WH310> eat<WH398> of<WH4480> the holy things;<WH6944> because<WH3588> it<WH1931> is his food.<WH3899>
That which dieth of itself,<WH5038> or is torn<WH2966> with beasts, he shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> to defile<WH2930> himself therewith: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

They shall therefore keep<WH8104> <WH853> mine ordinance,<WH4931> lest<WH3808> they bear<WH5375> sin<WH2399> for<WH5921> it, and die<WH4191> therefore, if<WH3588> they profane<WH2490> it: I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> do sanctify<WH6942> them.

There shall no<WH3808> <WH3605> stranger<WH2114> eat<WH398> of the holy thing:<WH6944> a sojourner<WH8453> of the priest,<WH3548> or a hired servant,<WH7916> shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of the holy thing.<WH6944>

But if<WH3588> the priest<WH3548> buy<WH7069> any soul<WH5315> with his money,<WH7075> <WH3701> he<WH1931> shall eat<WH398> of it, and he that is born<WH3211> in his house:<WH1004> they<WH1992> shall eat<WH398> of his meat.<WH3899>
If <WH3588> the priest's<WH3548> daughter<WH1323> also be<WH1961> married unto a stranger,<WH376> <WH2114> she<WH1931> may not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of an offering<WH8641> of the holy things.<WH6944>

But if<WH3588> the priest's<WH3548> daughter<WH1323> be<WH1961> a widow,<WH490> or divorced,<WH1644> and have no<WH369> child,<WH2233> and is returned<WH7725> unto<WH413> her father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> as in her youth,<WH5271> she shall eat<WH398> of her father's meat:<WH4480> <WH3899> <WH1> but there shall no<WH3605> <WH3808> stranger<WH2114> eat<WH398> thereof.

And if<WH3588> a man<WH376> eat<WH398> of the holy thing<WH6944> unwittingly,<WH7684> then he shall put<WH3254> the fifth<WH2549> part thereof unto<WH5921> it, and shall give<WH5414> it unto the priest<WH3548> <WH853> with the holy thing.<WH6944>
And they shall not<WH3808> profane<WH2490> <WH853> the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> <WH853> which<WH834> they offer<WH7311> unto the LORD;<WH3068>
Or suffer them to bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of trespass,<WH819> when they eat<WH398> <WH853> their holy things:<WH6944> for<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> do sanctify<WH6942> them.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> and to<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> and unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Whatsoever<WH376> <WH376> he be of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or of<WH4480> the strangers<WH1616> in Israel,<WH3478> that<WH834> will offer<WH7126> his oblation<WH7133> for all<WH3605> his vows,<WH5088> and for all<WH3605> his freewill offerings,<WH5071> which<WH834> they will offer<WH7126> unto the LORD<WH3068> for a burnt offering;<WH5930>
Ye shall offer at your own will<WH7522> a male<WH2145> without blemish,<WH8549> of the beefs,<WH1241> of the sheep,<WH3775> or of the goats.<WH5795>
But whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> hath a blemish,<WH3971> that shall ye not<WH3808> offer:<WH7126> for<WH3588> it shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> acceptable<WH7522> for you.

And whosoever<WH376> <WH3588> offereth<WH7126> a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> unto the LORD<WH3068> to accomplish<WH6381> his vow,<WH5088> or<WH176> a freewill offering<WH5071> in beefs<WH1241> or<WH176> sheep,<WH6629> it shall be<WH1961> perfect<WH8549> to be accepted;<WH7522> there shall be<WH1961> no<WH3808> <WH3605> blemish<WH3971> therein.

Blind, <WH5788> or<WH176> broken,<WH7665> or<WH176> maimed,<WH2782> or<WH176> having a wen,<WH2990> or<WH176> scurvy,<WH1618> or<WH176> scabbed,<WH3217> ye shall not<WH3808> offer<WH7126> these<WH428> unto the LORD,<WH3068> nor<WH3808> make<WH5414> an offering by fire<WH801> of<WH4480> them upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

Either a bullock<WH7794> or a lamb<WH7716> that hath any thing superfluous<WH8311> or lacking in his parts,<WH7038> that mayest thou offer<WH6213> for a freewill offering;<WH5071> but for a vow<WH5088> it shall not<WH3808> be accepted.<WH7521>

Ye shall not<WH3808> offer<WH7126> unto the LORD<WH3068> that which is bruised,<WH4600> or crushed,<WH3807> or broken,<WH5423> or cut;<WH3772> neither<WH3808> shall ye make<WH6213> any offering thereof in your land.<WH776>

Neither <WH3808> from a stranger's hand<WH4480> <WH3027> <WH1121> <WH5236> shall ye offer<WH7126> <WH853> the bread<WH3899> of your God<WH430> of any<WH4480> <WH3605> of these;<WH428> because<WH3588> their corruption<WH4893> is in them, and blemishes<WH3971> be in them: they shall not<WH3808> be accepted<WH7521> for you.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

When <WH3588> a bullock,<WH7794> or<WH176> a sheep,<WH3775> or<WH176> a goat,<WH5795> is brought forth,<WH3205> then it shall be<WH1961> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> under<WH8478> the dam;<WH517> and from the eighth day<WH4480> <WH3117> <WH8066> and thenceforth<WH1973> it shall be accepted<WH7521> for an offering<WH7133> made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD.<WH3068>
And whether it be cow<WH7794> or<WH176> ewe,<WH7716> ye shall not<WH3808> kill<WH7819> it and her young<WH1121> both in one<WH259> day.<WH3117>
And when<WH3588> ye will offer<WH2076> a sacrifice<WH2077> of thanksgiving<WH8426> unto the LORD,<WH3068> offer<WH2076> it at your own will.<WH7522>
On the same<WH1931> day<WH3117> it shall be eaten up;<WH398> ye shall leave<WH3498> none<WH3808> of<WH4480> it until<WH5704> the morrow:<WH1242> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
Therefore shall ye keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and do<WH6213> them: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Neither <WH3808> shall ye profane<WH2490> <WH853> my holy<WH6944> name;<WH8034> but I will be hallowed<WH6942> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> which hallow<WH6942> you,
That brought you out<WH3318> <WH853> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to be<WH1961> your God:<WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
